title: GLIDiC Sound Air TW-5000s True Wireless Earbuds - in-Ear Bluetooth Headphones with Mic - Pro Stereo Sound Sweatproof for Sports/Workout/Gym with Charging Case (Black)
description: The Sound Air TW-5000s wireless headphones boast advanced features found nowhere else on the market, including a multi-communication mode, voice calls with audio capabilities in both ears, and long standby times of up to 60 days. Sound While many headphones on the market have noise canceling capabilities, this functionality can cause users to miss important announcements and ambient sounds. The multi-communication mode of the TW-5000s model offers greater comfort and security for users by enabling select ambient sounds such as train announcements and vehicle sounds. Multi-communication mode allows these ambient sounds without compromising exceptional audio quality. In another innovative move, GLIDiC has created the TW-5000s headphones with user satisfaction in mind, creating a product that allows users to hear phone call sounds in both ears instead of just one, enhancing the user experience. Battery life The TW-5000s headphones have a longer battery life compared to the TW-5000 model. When in standby mode and stored in their case, listeners can enjoy up to 60 days of battery standby time, which is an improvement of nearly four times the battery life of GLIDIC's previous model. Intuitive multifunction buttons housed within the ergonomic earcups are multifunction buttons that allow users to easily control their listening experience. Both earbuds feature a multi-function button that allows complete audio control while listening to music, accepting or making a phone call, adjusting the volume, or activating and controlling the unit's voice assistant. The accompanying product manual highlights soft button commands. The award-winning design GLIDiC earphones have received accolades from various industry experts and publications. In 2018, GLIDiC products received the Chicago Good Design Award for elegant, professional styling and exceptional functionality.
